message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper is about targeted sentiment analysis, which is a subfield of natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning. The paper discusses the importance of capturing both explicit and implicit structural information for building a successful targeted sentiment analysis model. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category for this paper is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which covers NLP and related topics. The paper also involves machine learning techniques, which makes cs.LG (Machine Learning) another likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper discusses the effectiveness and robustness of the proposed model, which suggests that it may also belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also involves information retrieval techniques, which makes cs.IR (Information Retrieval) another possible sub-category. Finally, the paper involves neural networks, which suggests that it may also belong to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
